categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Meera Lisso was a female Human who trained as a Jedi at the Almas Academy and the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars.
Lisso was 19 when she began her Jedi training and she trained under Zelice Sturm.

Lisso survived the destruction of the Almas Academy, but witnessed Sturm's death at the hands of the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar during it. This drove her close to the dark side of the Force and afterwards, she accompanied the Heroes of Cularin on a mission to Coruscant to find Ezzar.
